channel.title: ONDA SALVAJE RADIO SHOW
channel.description:
ONDA SALVAJE is a Radio Show dedicated to: AOR, Hard Rock Sleazy & Heavy Metal styles, since 6 years ago. Also we have organized the VALENCIA AIR GUITAR & the female’s only bands: FEMME ROCK FESTIVAL.
Wednesdays at MISLATA RADIO 92.4 FM from 21:00 to 22:00 & Fryday listen to us online from 20:00 to 21:00 at TNT RADIO ROCK: www.tntradiorock.com
Directed & realised by: Susana Perales Supporters: Manu Losada Oficcial Web: www.myspace.com/ondasalvaje
If you want promotion your band, please sent your stuff (cds, dvds, info) for air play and possible review to the next postal address:
Mislata Radio 92.4 FM Onda Salvaje Susana Perales Plaza de la Constitución, 8 46920 Mislata (Valencia) Spain
channel.itunes:subtitle: A.O.R, HARD ROCK & HEAVY METAL
channel.itunes:author: ONDA SALVAJE
